frameworks.title: AI Adoption Accelerator Framework
frameworks.description: Systematic approach to accelerating AI adoption across organizations with change management and stakeholder alignment.
frameworks.use_case: Organizations struggling with AI adoption speed and employee resistance

frameworks.title: AI-First Service Line Framework
frameworks.description: Building service offerings with AI as the foundational capability rather than an add-on.
frameworks.use_case: Service businesses integrating AI as core capability rather than bolt-on

frameworks.title: AI Governance Model Framework
frameworks.description: Comprehensive governance structure for responsible AI deployment including ethics, compliance, and oversight.
frameworks.use_case: Enterprises needing structured AI governance and ethical oversight

frameworks.title: Crisis Integration & Stabilization Framework
frameworks.description: Rapid integration methodology for organizations in crisis, combining stabilization with strategic transformation.
frameworks.use_case: Organizations facing urgent integration challenges during crisis periods

frameworks.title: Emergency AI Governance Framework
frameworks.description: Rapid-deployment governance for AI systems during emergencies when standard processes are too slow.
frameworks.use_case: Deploying AI governance under time pressure during organizational emergencies

frameworks.title: Future State AI Operating Model Framework
frameworks.description: Designing the target operating model for an AI-native organization, including roles, processes, and technology architecture.
frameworks.use_case: Enterprise leaders designing their AI-native organizational future state

frameworks.title: Rapid AI Deployment Framework
frameworks.description: Fast-track AI implementation methodology for organizations that need results in weeks, not months.
frameworks.use_case: Organizations needing quick AI wins to build momentum and prove value

frameworks.title: Regulatory-Compliant AI Transformation Framework
frameworks.description: AI transformation methodology for heavily regulated industries including healthcare, finance, and government.
frameworks.use_case: Regulated industries implementing AI while maintaining compliance

frameworks.title: Resource-Conscious AI Implementation Framework
frameworks.description: AI implementation approach optimized for organizations with limited budgets, small teams, or constrained resources.
frameworks.use_case: Small businesses or teams implementing AI with limited resources

frameworks.title: Scaling AI Capabilities Framework
frameworks.description: Systematic approach to scaling successful AI pilots into enterprise-wide capabilities.
frameworks.use_case: Organizations scaling proven AI pilots to enterprise-wide deployment

frameworks.title: Strategic AI Use Case Portfolio Framework
frameworks.description: Portfolio management approach for evaluating, prioritizing, and managing multiple AI initiatives simultaneously.
frameworks.use_case: Leaders managing multiple AI initiatives and needing systematic prioritization

frameworks.title: Workflow Integration Architecture Framework
frameworks.description: Systematic methodology for integrating AI into existing business workflows without disruption.
frameworks.use_case: Teams integrating AI tools into established business processes
